text: Final Fantasy II is a fantasy role-playing video game. It was made by Squaresoft, now called Square Enix. Instead of getting stronger by getting points by killing monsters and using these to gain levels, for each attack you make there is a chance a stat (strength, health, agility...) will be increased. == References == Category:1988 video games Category:Final Fantasy games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:IOS games Category:Nintendo Entertainment System games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:PlayStation games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:Single-player video games Category:Turn-based role-playing video games Category:Video games about the afterlife Category:Video games set in hell Category:Virtual Console games Category:Virtual Console games for Wii U Category:Windows games
title: Final Fantasy II
